rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment contains a confidence cue ('will be able to eliminate') but no high-potency verbs or metaphors.
About future potential ('will be able to eliminate'), not realised impact.
Segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Reports a belief/goal ('will be able to eliminate') about future elimination, not current safety.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a hopeful future possibility/capability: 'we will be able to eliminate this'.
